thread.title: GRACE MCG
thread.title_full: World Wide Stereo reviewed by GRACE MCG

author: GRACE MCG
title: GRACE MCG
text: I found World Wide Stereo thru Upromise when searching for a receiver. They offered a good variety of choices. Picked out the one I wanted, compared the price to other stores, they had the best price. Placed my order and within a few days had my new receiver. It works great. A good place for electronics.
